quizzes.question: Can you insert a block element inside an inline element?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Types of Elements [/h1]

Other elements can be used either as block level elements or inline elements. This includes the following elements:
[b]APPLET[/b] - embedded Java applet
[b]IFRAME[/b] - Inline frame
[b]INS[/b] - inserted text
[b]MAP[/b] - image  map
[b]OBJECT[/b] - embedded object
[b]SCRIPT[/b] - script within an HTML document

You can insert inline elements inside block elements. For example, you can have multiple [b]<span>[/b] elements inside a [b]<div>[/b] element.
[note]Inline elements [b]cannot [/b]contain any block level elements.[/note]
